data.eml:eml: Molecular phylogeny, classification, and biogeography of West Indian racer snakes of the Tribe Alsophiini (Squamata, Dipsadidae, Xenodontinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hedges, Blair, Couloux, Arnaud, Vidal, Nicolas (2009): Molecular phylogeny, classification, and biogeography of West Indian racer snakes of the Tribe Alsophiini (Squamata, Dipsadidae, Xenodontinae). Zootaxa 2067: 1-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187018
